participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sensitive yet resilient, she is navigating through a tough breakup while embracing her passions.
participant_1.background: i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, he finds joy in simple pleasures and values mental challenges.
participant_2.background: i like to play chess. i don't drink alcohol. i am in my thirties. i love taking bubble baths.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i'm partly deaf.
i grow roses in my garden.
i've a big library at home.
i am a museum tour guide.
i love to drink fancy tea.
Please evaluate the whole dialog using one of the buttons below

Select a profile which, in your opinion, belongs to your partner: 

1️⃣:
i'm an omnivore.
i am expecting twins in two months.
i work at a bank.
i just bought my first home.
a already have a children.
2️⃣:
i am a little girl.
i've superpowers.
i like to make time stop.
i'm very lonely.
i live in the cloud.
Dialog is finished. Thank you for participation!
This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i am a musician and hope to make it big some day.
i play the piano and guitar and sing.
i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.
my favorite type of music to sing is folk music.
Please evaluate the whole dialog using one of the buttons below

Select a profile which, in your opinion, belongs to your partner: 

1️⃣:
i am a buddhist.
i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time.
i haven't spoken in three months.
i like meditation.
i live in alaska.
2️⃣:
i was adopted at a young age to an older couple.
i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.
i just got a job working in a gas station.
i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.
Dialog is finished. Thank you for participation!
